summary: The document comprises payroll authorization forms and related notifications from the Assassination Records Review Board, focusing on the payroll records of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) staff, particularly Lance W. Svendsen. It details Svendsen's employment, including his Social Security number, position titles, and gross annual salaries across different periods. Additionally, it includes a memorandum on payroll certification procedures, highlighting the need to disclose any familial relationships to current Members of Congress. Parts of the document were withheld from release to protect privacy, specifically the redaction of Social Security numbers.
key_findings: Detailed payroll information of Lance W. Svendsen, including Social Security number and salary adjustments, is presented.
Privacy concerns led to the redaction of Social Security numbers in parts of the document.
A memorandum outlines payroll certification procedures, with a focus on disclosing any familial ties to current Members of Congress.
The document tracks changes in Svendsen's position and salary over several years.
